Affinity for Treasures [i](This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Treasure you control.)[/i]
Haste, reach
[i]Shopkeeper's Charm[/i] – At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may tap an untapped creature you control. If you do, exile the top X cards of your library, where X is that creatures power. You may play those cards until the end of combat on your next turn.
[i]Firesale[/i] – Noncreature spells you cast have affinity for Treasures.
